title: China ends 33-year tax exemption on condoms to boost birth rate
description: China is ending a decades-long tax exemption on contraceptives to push up its birth rate. Experts say the change could leave women and young people more vulnerable.
content:
Condoms and other contraceptive products are likely to become more expensive in China from next month, as part of Beijing's wider push to lift the country's birth rate.
